reviewText: I still have not completed seeing all the excerpts from the 30 years of Marc Dorcel Anniversary pack.  The only reason to buy it was to get to see some of my favorite stars, including Laurie Sinclair, Anita Blond and Anita Dark.  I would have loved to have seen more of them, but I understand the limited time allotted to each of the stars over the years.  So far the collection is impressive, and will get through all the movies in time.
It was not clear said what is the DVD region.  My DVD player or bluray can not play it.  And  I found it out too late to return......money lost.
once again if you haven't had the pleasure of viewing Marc Dorcel videos ..you are missing out....trust me you will enjoy..
